message: I suggest a 60-40 split in my favor. This is a fair offer considering we both want to avoid inflation eating into our gains. If you reject, you'll already lose 10% value in the next round.

I propose a 55-45 split in my favor. Given the inflation impact, this offer still leaves you with a good share while compensating me for the value loss from last round. Let's settle this now to minimize further losses.
